1111215636108242945.text: We've been stress testing the parameters of our platform (and making some cool graphs in the process) - come and chat to us to find out more. pic.twitter.com/3xhkPNkPO2

1120499274985410560.text:
Our core purpose is to share risk with our members.

Starting with Smart Contract Cover https://medium.com/nexus-mutual/smart-contract-cover-55782407722c …pic.twitter.com/Wkc2i3z0Qu

1116398506745520130.text:
Our NXM token will be fully functional at launch.

All funds go into the mutual (like a DAO).

 NXM holders will own the surplus generated from cover purchases.

Learn more  https://discord.gg/DwtQuSD pic.twitter.com/nC98tYk5gG

1120499279590830080.text: We have an NXM token to facilitate interactions between members, such as staking and voting.

1114009546547060736.text:
Two days ago the Australian government changed the law to open up capital raising options for mutuals / cooperatives.

 This is critical for mutuals to grow.

 Nexus uses the flexibility of token economics to achieve a similar result.

@ICMIF_Webhttps://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6519724824745648128 …

1118830093172789248.text: Being a digital cooperative (DAO) means being owned by our members. The more you participate, the more NXM tokens you will hold.pic.twitter.com/0sjO6f6Uxi

1118830096905842690.text: Our turtle thinks this is very cool - but doesn't have a name yet. Just look at that face - can you help?

1113654419340423168.text:
Staking networks are starting to grow 

Usually they require native token + computing resources  to earn interest.

With Nexus you will need NXM + human judgement  to earn rewards.

Learn more  https://discord.gg/DwtQuSD pic.twitter.com/kUYhjAeTm1

1120499278059843584.text:
If you contribute to the cooperative you will own part of it.

It is your money.

1115878914990247936.text:
Are you a security auditor?

 Did you know that you'll be able to earn rewards for your skills when we launch?

 Stake against smart contracts you believe are secure to earn.

Keep in touch  https://discord.gg/DwtQuSD pic.twitter.com/pQkcnNijPk

1110895933716393984.text:
We're keeping a close eye on staking networks as they start to grow! 

Insurance companies need interest bearing assets with low risk of default (slashing) 
 Staking networks will be a perfect investment for our capital pool funds.
